attributes.action: Stop the police tactic of Bubble Trips in football
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to stop the draconian police tactics of the ' Bubble Trip ' where football fan movement is restricted to such a level that it infringes on our freedom of movement.

We believe fans should be able to make the choices themselves on how they travel to football games and to restrict innocent football fans freedom of movement is a breach of our basic human rights.

Please support this cause and share it with your fellow football fans.
